verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: reporters] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARG1: that AT&T 's proposed acquisition of Time Warner is " not good for the country] . "
President Donald Trump told reporters on Tuesday that [ARG1: AT&T 's proposed acquisition of Time Warner] [V: is] " not [ARG2: good for the country] . "
